title: The Tale of a Forest 720p BluRay x264 AC3 MVGroup.org
description:
The Tale of a Forest

Nature Documentary hosted by Jonathan Hutchings, published by MRP Productions in 2012 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/c/c7/The-Tale-of-a-Forest-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

Tale of a Forest is a film for the whole family about the unique Finnish forest with its colouful and diverse life. This documentary is an extensive, stunning look at the prosperous animal and plant life that makes its habitat in the extravagant forests of Northern Finland, and the obstacles both must conquer as the seasons alter.
The main characters of the film are the assortment of inhabitants of the forest: the bears and the elk, the snakes and the owls, the ants, the frogs and the flying squirrels, the ancient soul birds such as the Siberian Jay, the Lapland Owl and many, many others.
Side by side with the factual documentation the mythical dimension is conveyed in the narration with references to ancient legends and the pantheistic imagination of great authors.
The feature documentary has been written and directed by Ville Suhonen and Kim Saarniluoto, produced by Marko Rohr for MRP Matila Rohr Productions
